name: Panzer General 2
description:
Will you fight as a Wehrmacht Officer, or perhaps lead your comrades in the Soviet Army? You may want to hit the beaches at Salerno and Normandy as an American or British General. No matter what path you choose, you will need all your skills to triumph. The successful Panzer General devises sound strategic plans, and carries them out with unswerving commitment. Generals who are indecisive inevitably fail. Can you forge a battle-winning command and conquer your foes? Isn't it time to find out?A grand turn based-strategy on an army level
Hundreds of types of brigades that gain experience from engagements under skilled commanders
All main European and African battles of WWII are present, plus fictional scenarios and a mission editor
